attributes.action: Stop the proliferation of Mandarin in schools on the grounds it is too difficult despite the fact that the TImes think's it isn't
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should be promoting European languages based on an alphabetic system rather than Mandarin which is pictogram and ideogram based. YES, learn a euro language first THEN go on to MANDARIN or Arabic etc, not the other way round.
